name: Leech Life
description: You attempt to suck away some of a creatureâ€™s life force. Make a melee attack roll, doing 2d6 + MOVE bug damage on a hit. Half of the damage done is restored to the user.
higherLevels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 4d6 at level 10, and 6d6 at level 17.
